name: Autumn
tagline: Stripe made easy for AI startups
description: Autumn helps AI startups price, meter, and control usage with just 3 API calls. Built on Stripe, it manages subscriptions, usage, and access in one place. No webhooks or backend logic needed. Ideal for early stage teams building LLM and image apps.

name: mcp-use
tagline: Open source SDK and infra for MCP servers & agents
description: mcp-use is the open-source devtools and cloud infrastructure to help dev teams quickly build and deploy custom AI agents with MCP servers. Our SDK has over 5,000 GitHub stars, 100k downloads, and is trusted by engineers at NASA, Cisco, NVIDIA, etc...

name: Bio Calls by Cross Paths
tagline: Monetize all your social media in 60 seconds
description: Link-in-bio on anabolic steroids — Hop on 1:1 calls with your social media followers. Display links. Join the pack and solve problems cooperatively. Earn actively and passively. ❤️

name: Kandid
tagline: Consultative AI salesperson for ecommerce
description: Kandid is an AI-powered sales assistant for consumer brands that boosts conversions by guiding shoppers, recommending products, answering queries, and upselling like a trained store rep - all in real time, 24x7, across your website.

name: Fellow API
tagline: Build custom workflows from meeting transcripts and AI notes
description: Whether you need to archive compliance records, trigger workflows when key terms appear, feed dashboards with fresh insights, or pass transcripts to an LLM for tailored recaps and action plans, Fellow’s API gives you everything you need to make it happen.

name: Compozy
tagline: Next-level Agentic Orchestration Platform
description: Create, deploy, and manage robust multi-agent systems with Compozy—unifying agents, tasks, tools, and signals into scalable YAML workflows. Powered by Go and Temporal for performance and reliability, it optimizes costs and gives enterprises full control.

name: Reeroll
tagline: The AI Video Editor
description: Reeroll is an AI video editor for creating short, engaging videos in minutes. Choose a template, add your assets and links, and Reeroll will customize it for you. No complex editors, just a simple chat that turns ideas into ready-to-publish videos.

name: DownMark
tagline: Turn web content into clean Markdown with one click
description: DownMark extracts web articles and converts them to clean Markdown files. This Safari extension intelligently filters ads and clutter, preserving only essential content with proper formatting for knowledge workers.

name: Whispering
tagline: Open-source, local-first dictation you can trust
description: Whispering is an open-source, local-first transcription app. Use local and cloud models, chain custom transforms, and most importantly, keep your audio local on-device. Fast, ergonomic, and MIT-licensed. Let’s make closed-source apps obsolete. 🚀

name: Inworld Runtime
tagline: The AI runtime for top consumer applications
description: The first AI-native backend engineered to power massive-scale consumer applications. Easily scale from prototype to millions. Automated MLOps frees you from maintenance. Deploy no-code experiments instantly. Battle-tested through work with NVIDIA, Google, Xbox

name: VibeKit CLI
tagline: The safety layer for your coding agent
description: Universal CLI wrapper that provides secure sandboxing, sensitive data redaction, and observability for Claude Code, Gemini CLI, or AI coding agent.

name: MaskLLM
tagline: Mask your LLM APIs for secure rotation and logging
description: MaskLLM helps you mask your LLM API keys for secure rotation and sharing across different development environments.

name: AI research creator
tagline: AI that writes your research questions for you
description: Skip the blank page. Ballpark AI assistant turns your goals into ready-to-use research studies. Launch surveys, unmoderated and moderated tests, video and audio studies and much more in a single unified research platform.

name: Besimple AI
tagline: Your own data annotation platform in 60 sec
description: You can spin up your own fully custom data annotation platform in 60 seconds - built for the AI agent world. Just sign up here (https://trybesimple.ai/login).

name: MOBORE
tagline: Find the Bugs That Cost You Money with mobore
description: Mobore provides end‑to‑end observability for your React Native app. Catch crashes, monitor performance, and optimize user journeys.

name: Custos
tagline: Personalized email drafts in seconds from your inbox
description: Custos creates emails in seconds that match the context of your conversations and sound just like you directly from your inbox. You never have to start from scratch again.

name: YT Detox
tagline: Consume Youtube as Text and Get Back Your Productive Time
description: Spending hours on youtube makes you low productive? Here is YT detox, it monitors your favourite channels and sends you personalised Summaries with Key points, data points, and take aways in Realtime.

name: Vaultrice
tagline: Real-time state management without the backend hassle
description: Vaultrice is a globally distributed key-value store with real-time collaboration features. Build collaborative apps with familiar localStorage-like API, instant WebSocket sync, and built-in presence detection.

name: Twitter Carousel Generator
tagline: Turn Twitter threads into carousels for Instagram, Linkedin
description: Free tool to generate carousel post images and PDF from Twitter threads, ready to be posted on social media platforms like Instagram, LinkedIn, and Tiktok

name: Heuristica
tagline: Visual learning and research using concept maps & mind maps
description: Heuristica is an AI-powered concept mapping tool for visual learning and research. Users can explore complex ideas on an infinite canvas, chat with AI, generate flashcards, quizzes, notes, and more, making it perfect for students, educators, and researchers.
